markdownRemark.html:
Design Principles, CSS Grid

CSS Grid is a thing.

For the following few days, let’s work a bit with CSS grids.

It’s one dimension more than flexbox, so it’s one dimension more complex. But it’s one dimenion more fun!

Objectives

There are so many ways to implement this design that I cannot help but urge everyone to give it a try.

Design Principles by Hrvoje Grubisic.

Reading

Of course, we’ll be reading CSS Grid Layout Module 1.

It’s a big chunk, let’s just read the first 3 chapters for now.

frontmatter.title: Study Notes: CSS Grid Layout Module 1 - Chapter 1~3
